entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:08 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain and ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:31 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 06:31 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
